CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Delivered to End Users stage positioned above or below the Post-Distribution stage?
SRP.A: The Delivered to End Users stage is positioned {below} the Post-Distribution stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Distribution is {23262}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Delivered to End Users?
VE.A: The value of stage Delivered to End Users is {11534}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Transmission?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Transmission is {36575}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Generation, with a value of {52110}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Delivered to End Users, with a value of {11534}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission?
SC.A: Decreased by {15535} Megawatt Hours from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 17398? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Generation} stage has {52110}, the {Post-Transmission} stage has {36575}, the {Post-Distribution} stage has {23262}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 29918? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Distribution} stage has {23262}, the {Delivered to End Users} stage has {11534}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 5767 and 44342? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Transmission} stage has {36575}, the {Post-Distribution} stage has {23262}, the {Delivered to End Users} stage has {11534}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Distribution to Delivered to End Users, or from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Transmission} to {Post-Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Distribution to Delivered to End Users, or from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Generation} to {Post-Transmission} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Distribution to Delivered to End Users, from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution, or from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Generation} to stage {Post-Transmission} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Generation} and {Post-Transmission} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Distribution} and {Delivered to End Users} stages.
